snippet.title: Bandit Trap - Official Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Take a look at chaotic gameplay from Bandit Trap in this trailer for the upcoming 3vs1 physics-driven online multiplayer game. Bandit Trap will be available on PC. Defend your home against a bandit invasion using inventive boobytraps as a Trapper, or join a team of three Bandits and try to get away with the loot!
